isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 2.4: PERFORMANCE SPECIFICATIONS

svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para:
Refer to Table 2.34
for T 444E 160HP @ 2600 rpm, 49 state performance specifications for 1994 model year.

table.title: Table 2.34 - T 444E/160 HP @ 2600 RPM [49 state 1994 model year]

entry.para: Turbocharger Part Number (With Exhaust Back Pressure Device)
Turbocharger Part Number (Without Exhaust Back Pressure Device)
High Idle Speed - RPM with manual transmission
High Idle Speed - RPM with automatic transmission
Intake and Exhaust Valve Clearance (Engine Off - Hot or Cold):

para.emph: The following data to be taken at high idle with [no load].

entry.para: Air Cleaner Restriction [Measured @ Air Cleaner Outlet] ( See Note 1)
(Check at Full Load, Rated Speed) - Max
Fuel Inlet Restriction Maximum ( See Note 1)

para.emph: The following data to be taken at full load, full throttle rated engine speed on chassis dynamometer or on highway.

entry.para: Exhaust Back Pressure (After Turbocharger [Maximum]) ( See Note 1)
Smoke Level Max. - Bosch Number ( See Note 1)
Measure water temperature differential across the radiator with engine on a chassis dynamometer, at full load and ambient temperature of 80° F or above.

para.emph: The following data to be taken after engine reaches stabilized operating temperature.

entry.para: Lube Oil Pressure at Operating Temperature:

para.emph: NOTE 1: Engine must be at normal operating temperature.
NOTE 2: Crankcase pressure [ maximum ] as measured with Orificed Restrictor Tool ZTSE4146.
